A line that is used to split the display into two visual parts, one for the queue and one for the input of the queue An icon used to display an x if the queue is empty or a check-mark if the queue is full A rectangle that serves as the background of the returned values of the available operations
A rectangle that serves as the background of the operation group type An arrow that opens and closes the available operations of the group type
A rectangle that serves as the background of the operation group add An arrow that opens and closes the available operations of the group add A check sign that conforms the chosen adding operation for the current value selected by the slider
A rectangle that serves as the background of the operation group delete An arrow that opens and closes the available operations of the group delete
A rectangle that serves as the background of the operation group get An arrow that opens and closes the available operations of the group get
